Air: 10
Con: 200-10000

for ppm = a*ratio^b:

Gas    | a       | b
LPG    | 20.3079 | -0.4349
CH4    | 22.011  | -0.4029
H2     | 26.9497 | -0.2956
Alcohol| 19.3261 | -0.1655
CO     | 13.4917 | -0.0777

for ppm = 10^[(log10(ratio)-b)/m]:

Gas    | m       | b
LPG    | -0.4349 | 1.3077 
CH4    | -0.4029 | 1.3426
